  • Method Details

    • uploadImageForUser

      FileDTO uploadImageForUser(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image, String username) throws IOException

      Saves image to database and bound it to User.

      Parameters:
      image - - image to save.
      username - - User's username to bound.
      Returns:
      DTO object that contains image data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if image compressing is failed.

    • uploadImagesForPost

      List<FileDTO> uploadImagesForPost(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> images, String postId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)

      Saves images to database and bounds it to specific post.

      Parameters:
      images - to save.
      postId - post's generated unique identifier.
      authentication - for searching currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      list of images.

    • updateImagesForPost

      List<FileDTO> updateImagesForPost(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> images, String postId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws PostNotFoundException

      Updates images for specific post.

      Parameters:
      images - to update.
      postId - post's generated unique identifier.
      authentication - for searching currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      list of Images.
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if post is not found or author and current user doesn't match.

    • getImagesByPost

      List<FileDTO> getImagesByPost(PostEntity post)

      Retrieve images by specific post.

      Parameters:
      post - we want to retrieve images from.
      Returns:
      list of images.
